changeSet.sql: UPDATE client_details set group_orcid=COALESCE((SELECT group_orcid FROM profile WHERE orcid = client_details_id), (SELECT orcid FROM profile WHERE orcid = client_details_id));

changeSet.author: Will Simpson
changeSet.sql: UPDATE client_details set client_type=(SELECT client_type FROM profile WHERE orcid = client_details_id);
